verses.text: And it came to pass, when all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \add were\add* on the \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, which \add were\add* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, until we were passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, that their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w*, neither was there \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in them any more, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w sharp|strong="H6697"\w* \w knives|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w circumcise|strong="H4135"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*.\f + \fr 5.2 \ft sharp…: or, knives of flints\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him \w sharp|strong="H6697"\w* \w knives|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* at the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of the \w foreskins|strong="H6190"\w*.\f + \fr 5.3 \ft sharp…: or, knives of flints\f*\f + \fr 5.3 \ft the hill…: or, Gibeah-haaraloth\f*

And this \add is\add* the \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* why \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* did \w circumcise|strong="H4135"\w*: All the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add that were\add* \w males|strong="H2145"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, after they came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* were \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*: but all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* \w born|strong="H3209"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* as they came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add them\add* they had not \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*.

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, till all the \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \add that were\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, which came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, were \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*, because they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: unto whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* that he would not \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* them the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* that he would \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

And their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \add whom\add* he raised \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in their stead, them \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*: for they were \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, because they had not \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* them by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

And it came to pass, when they had \w done|strong="H8552"\w* \w circumcising|strong="H4135"\w* all the \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, that they \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in their places in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, till they were \w whole|strong="H2421"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft they had…: Heb. the people had made an end to be circumcised\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* have I rolled \w away|strong="H1556"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* from off you. Wherefore the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft Gilgal: that is Rolling\f*

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

And they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the old \w corn|strong="H5669"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* after the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, unleavened \w cakes|strong="H4682"\w*, and \w parched|strong="H7033"\w* \add corn\add* in the \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And the \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* \w ceased|strong="H7673"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* after they had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* of the old \w corn|strong="H5669"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; neither had the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* any more; but they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* that \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* was by \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, that he lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* over against him with his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Art\add* thou for us, or for our \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay; but \add as\add* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* am I now \w come|strong="H0935"\w*. And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and did \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \w saith|strong="H1696"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* unto his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*?\f + \fr 5.14 \ft captain: or, prince\f*

And the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w Loose|strong="H5394"\w* thy \w shoe|strong="H5275"\w* from off thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*; for the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whereon thou \w standest|strong="H5975"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*. And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so.
